title: Thunderbird Signature in Android App
creator: dominicbaur86
content: I want to create an email signature with an image on my Android device, but I can't upload or insert it! Is there a guide for this? Or is it not possible to insert photos in the Thunderbird Android app, but only text?
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) SamsungBrowser/27.0 Chrome/125.0.0.0 Safari/537.36;os:Samsung Galaxy tab s8 plus
